lyrics:
16 contributorsnow or never lyricsintro
in this time are we loving
or do we sit here wondering
why this world isnt turning around
its now or never

verse 1
we have no use for the truth
and nows the time for us to lose

prechorus
who we are and how weve tried
taking every step in stride
its now or never to decide

chorus
in this time are we loving
or do we sit here wondering
why this world isnt turning around
its now or never
in this way are we learning
or do we sit here yearning
for this world to stop turning around
its now or never

verse 2
wheres the truth for us to use
cause all we seem to do is lose
you might also likeprechorus
who we are and how weve tried
are we all the same inside
its now or never to decide

or do we sit here yearning

or do we sit here wondering
why this world isnt turning around

chorus

or do we sit here wondering
why this world isnt turning around

outro
